info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 02 at 9:54PM CDT until September 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High waves up to 6 feet and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. * WHERE...Lake IL, Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...From late Saturday afternoon through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. For information on swim advisories or bans at Chicago beaches: www. cpdbeaches. com. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous swimming coniditons are expected to quickly develop behind a cold front mid to late afternoon Saturday.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
